en-US.summary: Sliding puzzle controlled by robotic arm through voice instructions
examplePhrases: Alexa tell Sliding Puzzle to start
Alexa ask Sliding Puzzle to move right 2 steps
en-US.name: Sliding Puzzle
en-US.description: Want to play the Sliding Puzzle? Use command like 'move right 2 steps' to control the robotic arm. Enjoy!
